description:
Bela Vista Farm: Excellence in South Minas Coffee


Situated in the south of Minas, Bela Vista farm thrives in a distinctive micro-region known for producing exceptional highland coffee. This family-owned, traditional estate combines time-honored knowledge with cutting-edge agricultural techniques to achieve a consistent and recognizably high-quality coffee. The farm uses rigerous cultivation practices while maintaining complete traceability throughout the production process.


Beyond coffee production, Bela Vista demonstrates its community commitment by funding a primary school serving both workers' children and the surrounding rural community.
 

Cupping Notes: Fazenda Bela Vista Washed Yellow Bourbon has notes of red fruit, mild acidity, and a creamy body.
 
Try before you stock up with a 1/2lb sample!!
